@TwistedPencils There's 3 kind of Nousagis (Blue, Pink and Orange Nousagi info > 2:12 ). One of them is bully nousagis (blue nousagi). They are kind of nousagis that like to tease Pekora (sometimes even make Pekora crying and angry), but they are the one who love her the most (some of them worship her like a 'fantasy' god) and Pekora herself love them too. They are not haters, it's just Pekora character is make them become like that. If you know Pekora for a long time, you will know the person behind Pekora (IRL Pekora) is actually acting as a fantasy character. That is why if you see someone tease Pekora, is because IRL Pekora make them become like that to make stream more interesting. She is a natural born comedian.

I'm thinking Pekora first time meeting with Moona is a fated one.. as there's a myth surrounding rabbit and moon. It is said that rabbit and moon closely associated with each other. Here's some description i got from cgtn: 
"In Chinese folklore, the moon rabbit lives on the moon and mix its elixir of life under a cassia tree. In the Mayan culture, the moon goddess is always depicted with a rabbit in her hand. In Egyptian mythology, rabbits are closely associated to the cycles of the moon. In the Greek mythology, rabbits have an important role that resembles fruitfulness and is related to moon goddesses."

i think she just put several cows in a tight place. the cows will still reproduce. and when the switch is pushed, the ground will open and there are water there that make the cows float. kill the cows, and profit!

Yup she need to breed them gradually. the limit of cow spawn on that one block cage is 24 cow.after that the 25 cow start dying and absorbed to Hopper and goes to chest.

the button on dispenser is to make water come out and flood the cow platform.i don't know the purpose of it,maybe to kill them faster since it become cramped

@Freyja Wion the water is there to make them bob up and down to make it easier to feed them. if there was no water they would clump together facing you and its a lot harder to aim for a different one you havent fed yet.
